info.description: We host biweekly Hackathons at the Queens College Incubator. This is freeform, self-organized hackathon where creativity knows no bounds. Whether you're a seasoned pro, aspiring entrepreneur, or a passionate hobbyist, this event is tailor-made for tech enthusiasts like you. Bring your laptops, your brightest ideas, and ongoing projects â€“ let's build something extraordinary together!
Join us for our monthly happy hours! This is a good way to meet the rest of the group, unwind, and socialize or network in a more casual setting.
